data.title: Community Events
data.meta_description: Eyemart Express goes beyond eye care to help the communities we serve. Through various partnerships, fundraisers, and outreach, we make a difference....
data.text:
"Stand Up to Cancer"

"Stand Up to Cancer"

"Stand Up to Cancer"

Since 2015, we have been in partnership with Visual Eyes Eyewear to support the Stand Up To Cancer® mission to accelerate cancer research so that all cancer patients can become long-term cancer survivors. We have created an annual fundraising campaign supporting SU2C through sales of our SU2C® branded eyewear collection. To date, we’ve raised over $700,000.

For more information about Stand Up To Cancer, visit StandUpToCancer.org

"Petfinder Foundation"

"Petfinder Foundation"

"Petfinder Foundation"

The Petfinder Foundation is a nonprofit that works to prevent the euthanasia of adoptable pets by assisting animal shelters and rescue groups. For eight years, we've partnered with this great organization by selling pet-themed lens cloths and donating $1 from every purchase directly to the foundation. With your generosity, you've helped us raise over $49,000.

For more information about the Petfinder Foundation, visit PetfinderFoundation.com

"Veterans of Foreign Wars"

"Veterans of Foreign Wars"

"Veterans of Foreign Wars"

We are proud to be the exclusive eyewear provider of the Veterans of Foreign Wars (VFW) organization. The VFW is a nonprofit that services veterans and other military service personnel. In addition to providing exclusive discounts to members, we also support the Unmet Needs program, which offers financial assistance to military personnel and families in need. To date, we have supported 57 families in need.

For more information about VFW, visit VFW.org

"Jonas Paul"

"Jonas Paul"

"Jonas Paul"

Catching early vision issues is something that is in the forefront of our mission as an eyewear provider, which is why we’ve proudly partnered with Jonas Paul. They believe that providing eye care for children is essential for creating a better tomorrow. Their mission is to eliminate childhood blindness all over the world. Jonas Paul utilizes a network of partners to improve the quality of life for children with disabilities in underserved communities around the globe.

For more information about Jonas Paul, visit JonasPaul.com

"Peace Love"

"Peace Love"

"Peace Love"

Most recently, we’ve partnered with PeaceLove to create a line of frames and accessories that will be launching very soon. PeaceLove supports mental wellness through virtual and in-person classes and workshops that combine no-pressure creativity and freeing self-expression. They make it easy to express what’s going on inside when finding the words feels tough. PeaceLove provides a safe space for people of all ages to let go, have fun, and create peace of mind.

For more information about PeaceLove, visit PeaceLove.org

"Cedar Springs Vision"

"Cedar Springs Vision"

"Cedar Springs Vision"

Since 2007, we’ve been partners with Cedar Springs Vision, a nonprofit organization based in Dallas, Texas. In conjunction with the Cedar Springs Eye Clinic, a satellite clinic of the University of Houston College of Optometry, they have improved people’s lives by providing vision and eye care services to underserved communities in the Dallas-Fort Worth area at little to no cost. In addition to providing eye care, the Cedar Springs group has served as a training center for opticians and optometrists. Every year we donate frames to their organization so that they can continue to do incredible work. As of today, we’ve given nearly 20,000 pairs of glasses.

To learn more, visit opt.uh.edu

"Local Outreach"

"Local Outreach"

"Local Outreach"

Throughout the year, we empower our associates to bring to us the organizations that mean the most to them in their communities. We organize in-store donation centers that welcome contributions from everyone. Over the years, we’ve made sizable donations to children’s hospitals, food banks, homeless shelters, and more.
